attributes.action: encourage and take part in regular and balanced debate on climate change, with the aim of implementing policy to reduce emissions and reduce negative influence on climate
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: More attention needs to be drawn towards climate change.  Climate change should be a prominent feature of political debate with the overall aim of implementing effective, accountable, and transparent policy to help reduce emissions and reduce the negative effects which humans are having on the environment.  This is not just applicable to the UK, but must be applied throughout the world to encourage debate and policy change on a global scale.  This petition aims to highlight the importance of taking action on climate change now, by showing politicians that members of the public hold this topic at the forefront of their minds.

rejection.details:
